mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS ( NO , CATEGORY , NAME , PRICE , STOCK , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOODS_NO.NEXTVAL , #{category} , #{name} , #{price} , #{stock} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' )
INSERT INTO GOODS_REVIEW ( NO , GOODS , WRITER , SCORE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_GOODS_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL , #{goods} , #{writer} , #{score} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT NO , CATEGORY , NAME , PRICE , STOCK , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN FROM GOODS WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
